items.text: driven down to long-off as they jog the single
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.text: tossed up on middle, he lunges forward and defends into the leg side
items.shortText: Mosaddek Hossain to Hetmyer, no run
Mosaddek Hossain to Hetmyer, no run
Mosaddek Hossain to Hetmyer, 2 runs
Mosaddek Hossain to Hetmyer, 1 run
Mosaddek Hossain to Mohammed, no run
Mosaddek Hossain to Mohammed, 1 run
Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammed, no run
Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammed, no run
Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammed, 2 runs
Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammed, 2 runs
Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammed, 1 run

items.text: super placement. Got inside the line and picked this nicely with the spin to the fine leg boundary.
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hetmyer, FOUR runs

items.preText:
Anon06: "For someone as experience as Jason Mohammed who also averages 40 in List A (among the highest in the West Indies from current players), take out his 2 productive series last year against Eng and Pak and he averages 14 in over 20 ODIs with a SR of 55-ish. Very appalling."

Rubel into the attack
items.text: pulled, but not in control. Rolls down to long leg.
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Mohammed, 1 run

items.text: beaten as he looks to ease this behind point. Rubel slanted this across
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: short of length on the stumps, he gets on top of the bounce and whips this to deep square leg
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.text: defends this with an angled bat towards cover point.
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Mohammed, no run

items.text: has he nicked this? Yes, he has. This is a thin inside edge as he looks to slash through point, but didn't have any room to do so. Poor shot selection from Jason Mohammed. West Indies are properly tottering now.
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Mohammed, OUT

dismissal.text: JN Mohammed c †Mushfiqur Rahim b Rubel Hossain 12 (15b 1x4 0x6) SR: 80.00

items.preText: Rovman Powell is the new man in. Here's another opportunity to prove his worth with more than half the innings to come.
items.text: bunts this down to mid-on as he scampers a run to get off the mark
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Powell, 1 run

items.text: sharp turn from length, he bails out of a stroke
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Powell, no run

items.text: invites the drive by tossing this up nicely, left alone
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Powell, no run

items.text: stretches forward and bunts this into the off side
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Powell, no run

items.text: square turn. The length was on the shorter side, so he had time to adjust.
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Powell, no run

items.text: pushed to cover as he lunges forward to a full delivery
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Powell, no run

items.text: slow turn but he is fully committed forward as he defends back
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Powell, no run
